name: df-gdiv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cgs, cmpt(s0, cgr, cmpo(s1, s2, crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cgn, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ /g =(s0 ∈ GrpOp ↦(s1 ∈ ran(s0), s2 ∈ ran(s0)↦(s1[s0]((inv ` s0)` s2))))
comment: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's division (or subtraction) operation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
